MulticamOdometer Class Reference

Class responsible for computing the multi-camera system's motion given a set of feature matches. More...

Detailed Description

Class responsible for computing the multi-camera system's motion given a set of feature matches.

Estimate the motion of the multi-camera system.

Parameters
